short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Detect and play streaming URLs (HLS, M3U, TS) on web pages. Features built-in HLS player for seamless media playback.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
ASD - Advanced Streaming URL Detector

Easily detect, validate, and play streaming URLs on any webpage!

Key Features:
• Automatically detects streaming URLs (HLS, M3U, TS) on web pages
• Validates links to ensure they're active and accessible
• Built-in player for seamless media playback
• Copy URLs with a single click for easy sharing
• Maintains a history of detected URLs for future reference
• Export URL history to CSV for external use
• Dark mode support for comfortable viewing

Perfect for:
• Media enthusiasts looking for streaming sources
• Developers debugging streaming implementations
• Content creators tracking media distribution
• Anyone who frequently works with streaming media

ASD streamlines the process of finding and utilizing streaming URLs, saving you time and effort. Whether you're a casual user or a streaming professional, this tool enhances your browsing experience by providing quick access to media streams across the web.

Detect, validate, and play - all in one powerful extension!

Note: This extension respects your privacy and does not collect any personal data. All detected URLs are stored locally on your device.

Developed by Liran Yzhak
